title: Another Eden Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the mobile JRPG Another Eden. The list is divided into S and A tiers, with S Tier being the best. The characters are ranked based on their overall performance in the game, including their damage output, support abilities, and versatility.
heading: Another Eden Tier List
introText: This is a tier list for the mobile JRPG Another Eden. The list is divided into S and A tiers, with S Tier being the best. The characters are ranked based on their overall performance in the game, including their damage output, support abilities, and versatility.

data.itemDescription: The best healer in the game, with incredible healing and support skills
The most powerful wind character in the game, with devastating attacks and debuffs
The only shade character in the game, and one of the most powerful overall. He has great damage, debuffs, and utility
The best water character in the game, with powerful attacks and buffs
The only character with both fire and shade attacks, making her incredibly versatile. She has great damage and debuffs
The most powerful fire character in the game, with devastating attacks and a unique ability that lets her ignore enemy defenses
The best crystal character in the game, with great damage, buffs, and debuffs
The only character with both fire and water attacks, making her very versatile. She has good damage and debuffs
The best free character in the game, with great damage and support skills
A powerful fire character with great damage and debuffs
Another powerful fire character with great damage and a unique ability that lets her heal herself
The best wind support character in the game, with great buffs and debuffs
The best water support character in the game, with great buffs and debuffs
A powerful earth character with great damage and debuffs
Another powerful earth character with great damage and a unique ability that lets her ignore enemy defenses
The best wind damage dealer in the game, with devastating attacks
